attributes.action: Rather than subsidies Utility companies profits, renationalise them
attributes.additional_details:
More people will be thrown into fuel poverty with the predicted rises due to come, while energy, oil and gas companies are making more profits than ever before.

Tax payers money should not be used to subsidies these profits while people are struggling to pay theirs.
attributes.background:
Take utilities companies back under public ownership to stop the exploitation of bill payers by extortionate price increases at the tax payers expenses.

Privatised utility companies have paid out billions to shareholders while neglecting the infrastructure investments required

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621658
